predicate.note: Frames file for 'maul' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to injure by or as if by beating

example.name: transitive
example.text: This meant [*] returning to the golf course , where we watched a few French duffers maul the first tee while we sat under Cinzano umbrellas , me nursing an espresso and my ego [*T*-1] .
example.arg: while we sat under Cinzano umbrellas , me nursing an espresso and my ego
